div.a: Art Challenge for the Month of May

span.p: Fredericktown High School is planning on holding graduation on the weekend of May 15. Because we don't have the social distancing guidelines from Governor DeWine, it is difficult to say what graduation ceremony will look like at this time. As we get guidance from the state, we will let students, parents, and the community know how we plan on proceeding with graduation. Thank you for your patience and support during these unprecedented times.
